meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7271.

td.p: Kerstin Nordstrom, a physics professor from Northampton, Massachusetts
Udit Banerjea, an international relations graduate student from Washington, D.C.
Todd Giese, a hotel front desk manager from New Orleans, Louisiana (whose 4-day cash winnings total $82,403)

tr.td: POETRY, NON-POETICALLY
ASSORTED FRUIT
TEXAS HISTORY
BRANDED
GRAMMY'S BEST NEW ARTIST
SCRABBLE PLAYERS DICTIONARY "D"

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Alex: You are right with less than a minute to go.)

Tennyson

Udit
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'So, this poet writes of a massive military mess-up, & the poor soldiers--600, to be precise--man, they are just hosed!')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: So, this poet writes of a massive military mess-up, & the poor soldiers--600, to be precise--man, they are just hosed!
